net.hudup.core.alg

Class RecommenderAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    CompositeRecommenderAbstract, MemoryBasedRecommenderAbstract, ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract, ServiceRecommenderAbstract

    public abstract class RecommenderAbstract
extends AlgAbstract
implements Recommender
    This abstract class implements basically recommendation algorithms.

    • Field Detail

      • filterList

        protected RecommendFilterList filterList
        The filter list contains of filters. Filter specifies tasks which be performed before any actual recommendation tasks. Concretely, two methods RecommenderRemote.estimate(RecommendParam, Set) and RecommenderRemote.recommend(RecommendParam, int) require filtering tasks specified by filters of this list. Suppose every item has types 1, 2, 3, an example of filtering task is to select only type-1 items for recommendation task, which means that the list of recommended items produced by the method RecommenderRemote.recommend(RecommendParam, int) later contains only type-1 items.

    • Constructor Detail

        Default constructor.

      • unsetup

        public void unsetup()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RecommenderRemote
        Unset this recommender. After this method is called, this recommender cannot be used unless the method RecommenderRemote.setup(Dataset, Object...) is called again.
        Specified by:
        unsetup in interface RecommenderRemote
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • getFilterList

        public RecommendFilterList getFilterList()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RecommenderRemote
        Getting a list of filters. Filter specifies tasks which be performed before any actual recommendation tasks. Two methods RecommenderRemote.estimate(RecommendParam, Set) and RecommenderRemote.recommend(RecommendParam, int) will call this method before estimation task and recommendation task. Suppose every item have types 1, 2, 3, an example of filtering task is to select only type-1 items for recommendation task, which means that the list of recommended items produced by the method RecommenderRemote.recommend(RecommendParam, int) later contains only type-1 items.
        Specified by:
        getFilterList in interface RecommenderRemote
        Returns:
        list of filters.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • recommendPreprocess

        protected RecommendParam recommendPreprocess(RecommendParam param)
        Pre-processing the specified recommendation parameter. For example, if this recommendation parameter only has user identifier (user ID) but it has no ratings then, this method fills in ratings by reading such ratings from framework database.
        Parameters:
        param - recommendation parameter. Please see RecommendParam for more details of this parameter. Return null if cannot pre-processing.
        Returns:
        new recommendation parameter that is processed from the specified recommendation parameter.

        Returns:
